    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String afkChannel
      The channel where those who are afk are moved to.
      protected int afkTimeout
      The time in seconds for a user to be idle to be determined as "afk".
      protected List<IChannel> channels
      All text channels in the guild.
      protected IDiscordClient client
      The client that created this object.
      protected String icon
      The location of the guild icon
      protected String iconURL
      The url pointing to the guild icon

      The ID of this guild.

      The name of the guild.

      The user id for the owner of the guild
      protected String regionID
      The region this guild is located in.
      protected List<IRole> roles
      The roles the guild contains.
      protected List<IUser> users
      All users connected to the guild.
      protected List<IVoiceChannel> voiceChannels
      All voice channels in the guild.

        public void edit(Optional<String> name,
                 Optional<String> regionID,
                 Optional<IDiscordClient.Image> icon,
                 Optional<String> afkChannelID,
                 Optional<Integer> afkTimeout)
          throws HTTP403Exception
        Description copied from interface: IGuild
        Edits the guild.
        Specified by:
        edit in interface IGuild
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the guild.
        regionID - The region id for the guild.
        icon - The icon for the guild.
        afkChannelID - The afk channel for the guild. NOTE: if not present there will be no afk channel.
        afkTimeout - The afk timeout for the guild.
        Throws:
        HTTP403Exception
